alert.note: Alert for Newton; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:28PM CDT until May 12 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NEWTON AND SOUTHERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 528 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Morton to near Conehatta to 6 miles southwest of Duffee, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Forest, Morton, Newton, Union, Decatur, Conehatta, Hillsboro, Lake, Stratton, Lawrence, Pulaski, Steele, Duffee and Little Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
